name: What the Duck? (oHoodie, Feefafoozle, doodlenstein)
description:
Play the updated version here (re-added the levels that were accidently deleted):
https://drive.google.com/file/d/1fWsaN9dr0qa0Ahf3hcFjVwFxgGSLhHXe/view?usp=shari...

Help the Momma Duck get all of her ducklings to their nest, but be careful! The worms will fatten them up, but sometimes that's just what you need!

Done in 48 hours for Spring 2D Jam 2021.

How we tried to fit the theme of the jam (growth):
Fattening up the ducklings is essential to completing some of the stages. But there are also levels where this must be avoided. We had a lot of plans to incorporate this feature in various ways, but alas we ran out of time.

Controls:
Arrows or WASD to move
E, S or Space to Golf
Hold Z to Zoom out

Credits:
Programming by oHoodie
Art & Animations by Feefafoozle
Level Design & Misc by doodlenstein 
Music by Purple Planet Music, check them out here!
https://www.purple-planet.com/playful
